attributes.action: not "scrap the N.H.S."; and to reject any petition calling for it to be scrapped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition makes various points about the alleged failings of the N.H.S. but instead of calling for these to be dealt with suggests that everyone should have to take part in some sort of private arrangement.  How would people on low wages, or State benefits, afford this?  I would also point out that the provision of a publicly-funded National Health Service is something Britain should be very proud of; and also something other countries should emulate.
